name: Basic
description: A nice petal, not too strong but not too weak.

name: Light
description: Weaker than most petals, but recharges very quickly.

name: Rock
description: Extremely durable, but takes a bit longer to recharge.

name: Square
description: This shape... it looks familiar...

name: Rose
description: Its healing properties are amazing. Not so good at combat though.

name: Stinger
description: It really hurts, but it's very fragile.

name: Iris
description: Very poisonous, but takes a little while to do its work.

name: Wing
description: It comes and goes.

name: Missile
description: You can actually shoot this one.

name: Grapes
description: It goes poof. Now with a secret ingredient: poison.

name: Cactus
description: Not very strong, but somehow increases your maximum health.

name: Faster
description: It's so light it makes your other petals spin faster.

name: Bubble
description: Physics are for the weak.

name: Pollen
description: Asthmatics beware.

name: Dandelion
description: Its interesting properties inhibits healing effects on affected units.<n/>Affected units have their healing reduced by 20%. Stacks with itself.

name: Beetle Egg
description: Something interesting might pop out of this.

name: Antennae
description: Allows your flower to sense foes farther away.

name: Heavy
description: This thing is so heavy that nothing gets in the way.<n/>Slows down petal rotation speed when equipped.

name: Yin Yang
description: This mysterious petal affects the rotation of your petals in unpredictable ways.

name: Web
description: It's really sticky.

name: Honey
description: Mobs love this. Attracts them in a large radius.<n/>Mobs will prioritize this over flowers.<n/>Affected units develop immunity to its effects after some time.

name: Leaf
description: Gathers energy from the sun to heal your flower passively.

name: Salt
description: Reflects some of the damage you take back to the enemy that dealt it.<n/>Higher rarity mobs have higher resistance to damage reflection.

name: Rice
description: Spawns very quickly, but not very strong.

name: Corn
description: Takes a long time to spawn, but has a lot of health.

name: Sand
description: A bunch of sand particles.

name: Pincer
description: Debilitates enemies temporarily, reducing their movement speed.

name: Yucca
description: Heals your flower but only while in the defensive position.

name: Magnet
description: Increases drop pick up range.

name: Yggdrasil
description: A dried leaf from the Yggdrasil tree.<n/>Rumored to be able to bring the fallen back to life.

name: Starfish
description: Increases health regen while below 75% health.

name: Pearl
description: Just drop it off somewhere and use your kinetic powers so you don't lose it.

name: Lightning
description: Strikes several nearby enemies.

name: Jelly
description: No one likes touching this.

name: Claw
description: Deals extra damage if the victim is above 80% health.<n/>-50% damage vs other flowers.

name: Shell
description: Adds a temporary shield to yourself or allies.

name: Cutter
description: A friend used to own this... now it's time for revenge.<n/>Increases body damage.

name: Dahlia
description: A small amount of heal but fairly consistent.

name: Uranium
description: Periodically releases radiation.<n/>-75% damage versus other flowers.<n/>Effect strength depends on distance to petal.

name: Sponge
description: Spreads damage taken by the flower over a period of time.<n/>If destroyed, deals remaining damage all at once.<n/>Does not delay <c val="#ce76db">Poison</c> damage.

name: Soil
description: Increases health, but also increases flower size and decreases movement speed.

name: Fangs
description: Heals based on damage dealt by this petal.

name: Third Eye
description: Allows your flower to expand your petals further out.

name: Peas
description: It goes poof.

name: Mysterious Stick
description: A mysterious stick that summons the forces of the wind.

name: Clover
description: Increases your luck.<n/>Luck is used by specific petals to change their stats.

name: Mysterious Powder
description: Increases movement speed.<n/>Disabled if flower takes damage or if near a mob higher than a certain rarity.

name: Air
description: It's literally nothing.

name: Basil
description: Increases all healing received.

name: Orange
description: A sweet citrus fruit.

name: Ant Egg
description: Something interesting might pop out of this.

name: Poo
description: Makes mobs less likely to want to attack you.

name: Mysterious Relic
description: A strange relic. Significantly increases maximum health.<n/>Damage taken is spread among other wearers.

name: Lotus
description: Absorbs poison damage taken by the flower.

name: Light Bulb
description: A shiny lightbulb. Draws aggro from mobs.

name: Cotton
description: Absorbs damage taken by the flower.

name: Carrot
description: Sturdy and reliable. Can be shot and bounces off walls.

name: Bone
description: Sturdy.

name: Plank
description: Does 20x damage vs projectiles and petals.

name: Tomato
description: Gets stronger over time.

name: Dark Mark
description: A dark mark that binds itself to a fallen soul.

name: Rubber
description: Increases knockback received. Also absorbs lightning damage dealt to the flower.

name: Blood Stinger
description: It really hurts, but it's very fragile.<n/>Deals some of the damage dealt back to the flower.

name: Bur
description: Decreases armor of affected unit. Does not stack with itself.

name: Root
description: Provides additional armor but only while in the defensive position.

name: Ankh
description: An ancient relic.<n/>When destroyed, will teleport the flower back to where it was destroyed.

name: Dice
description: Has a 5% chance of dealing 35x damage.<n/>Chance increases by 4% per point in luck.

name: Talisman of Evasion
description: A necklace that allows the wearer to anticipate enemy attacks.

name: Battery
description: Discharges electricity whenever the flower gets hit.

name: Amulet
description: Converts a percentage of overheal into shields.

name: Compass
description: This crappy thing might be able to find something interesting...

name: Disc
description: Reduces damage taken from collisions with mobs and flowers.

name: Shovel
description: Becomes untargetable but unable to use petals for a limited time.

name: Coin
description: The power of capitalism compels you!

name: Poker Chip
description: ALL IN.

name: Card
description: A playing card. Likely marked.

name: Moon Rock
description: This thing is so big your petals orbit it instead.<n/>Where did you find this anyway?

name: Privet Berry
description: Deals extra <c val="#ce76db">Poison</c> damage based on the existing <c val="#ce76db">Poison</c> damage per second.

name: Glass
description: Phases through enemies.<n/>Cannot damage enemies more often than a certain interval.

name: Corruption
description: Corrupts one's soul, turning them against their own kind.

name: Mana Orb
description: Creates mana.

name: Blueberries
description: It goes poof. Now with the extra secret ingredient: lightning.

name: Magic Cotton
description: Absorbs damage taken by the flower.

name: Magic Stinger
description: It really hurts, but it's very fragile.

name: Magic Leaf
description: Gathers mana from the environment passively.

name: Magic Cactus
description: Increases maximum mana capacity.

name: Magic Eye
description: Consumes half the current mana and deals damage based on that value.

name: Magic Missile
description: You can actually shoot this one... with magic.

name: Magic Stick
description: A mysterious stick that summons the forces of the wind... with magic.

name: Coral
description: Breaks apart on impact.<n/>Each piece has 50% of the stats of the predecessor.

name: Magic Bubble
description: Physics are for the magicless.

name: Nazar Amulet
description: Reduces one damage instance damage by 98%.
